column2: [['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['APP Button User in conjunction with the auto-throttle and NAV-1 radio to activate a localizer or ILS approach.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["In the real aircraft, this button causes the auto-throttles to advance to a pre-defined limit N1 (turbine) limit expressed using the FMC.Pilot'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["CMD / A - Engages Autopilot ACMD / B - Engages Autopilot BCWS / A - Engages Autopilot A in Control Wheel Steering modeCWS / B - Engages Autopilot B in Control Wheel Steering modeRight Course Display and RotaryUsed to select the desired VOR radial for the first-officer's EHSI."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["CMD / A - Engages Autopilot ACMD / B - Engages Autopilot BCWS / A - Engages Autopilot A in Control Wheel Steering modeCWS / B - Engages Autopilot B in Control Wheel Steering modeRight Course Display and RotaryUsed to select the desired VOR radial for the first-officer's EHSI."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['A/P ENGAGEThe CMD buttons are used to engage the autopilot, noting there are two separate and identical systems - A, and B. Note that, after engaging the autopilot, the desired mode must still be selected subsequently.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Altitude Display and RotaryUsed in conjunction with the Altitude Hold Button and Vertical Speed Button.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['When Altitude Hold is engaged, the autopilot will immediately level-off, and the level-off altitude will be displayed here.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['ALT Hold Button Click this button to engage Altitude Hold Mode.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['APP Button User in conjunction with the auto-throttle and NAV-1 radio to activate a localizer or ILS approach.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['APP Button User in conjunction with the auto-throttle and NAV-1 radio to activate a localizer or ILS approach.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Vertical Speed Display and RotaryWhen VS (Vertical Speed) Mode is engaged, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to this value.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to the value indicated by the Vertical Speed Display.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['When Auto Throttle is engaged, the autopilot has command of the throttles, and will govern the airspeed according to the value indicated by the IAS / MACH Display.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Auto Throttle SwitchThis switch is used in conjunction with the IAS / MACH Rotary and Display.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["However, when in 'auto-land' mode, both are typically engaged together, to provide redundancy in case of failure."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['C/O Toggle Toggles the IAS / MACH display units between Knots and Mach-numberIAS / MACH Displayand RotaryWhen used in conjunction with the Speed Button, and Auto-Throttle, the autopilot will govern the speed according to this value.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Autopilot Disengage Click this button to disengage the autopilot and return full manual control to the flight crew.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["CMD / A - Engages Autopilot ACMD / B - Engages Autopilot BCWS / A - Engages Autopilot A in Control Wheel Steering modeCWS / B - Engages Autopilot B in Control Wheel Steering modeRight Course Display and RotaryUsed to select the desired VOR radial for the first-officer's EHSI."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["First-officer'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan.", "In the real aircraft, this button causes the auto-throttles to advance to a pre-defined limit N1 (turbine) limit expressed using the FMC.Pilot'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['The flight-crew can manually fly the aircraft according to the flight plan - by aligning the attitude indicator with the Flight Director pitch and bank command bars.', 'bank command bars']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Altitude Display and RotaryUsed in conjunction with the Altitude Hold Button and Vertical Speed Button.', 'ALT Hold Button Click this button to engage Altitude Hold Mode.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['VS ButtonClick']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["However, when in 'auto-land' mode, both are typically engaged together, to provide redundancy in case of failure."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['When Auto Throttle is engaged, the autopilot has command of the throttles, and will govern the airspeed according to the value indicated by the IAS / MACH Display.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["This works in conjunction with the VOR selected using the pilot's EHSI Control Panel.", 'Auto Throttle SwitchThis switch is used in conjunction with the IAS / MACH Rotary and Display.', 'C/O Toggle Toggles the IAS / MACH display units between Knots and Mach-numberIAS / MACH Displayand RotaryWhen used in conjunction with the Speed Button, and Auto-Throttle, the autopilot will govern the speed according to this value.', 'Heading Display and RotaryThis display is used in conjunction with the HEADING Rotary.', 'Altitude Display and RotaryUsed in conjunction with the Altitude Hold Button and Vertical Speed Button.', "This works in conjunction with the VOR selected using the first-officer's EHSI Control Panel.", 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to the value indicated by the Vertical Speed Display.', 'APP Button User in conjunction with the auto-throttle and NAV-1 radio to activate a localizer or ILS approach.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will maintain the current airspeed while ascending, or descending to the selected altitude.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will maintain airspeed according to the IAS / MACH Display.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['The CWS buttons are used to engage Control Wheel Steering mode, whereby the autopilot will allow the pilot to make inputs using the control wheel, after which it will hold the resulting attitude.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["CMD / A - Engages Autopilot ACMD / B - Engages Autopilot BCWS / A - Engages Autopilot A in Control Wheel Steering modeCWS / B - Engages Autopilot B in Control Wheel Steering modeRight Course Display and RotaryUsed to select the desired VOR radial for the first-officer's EHSI."]]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["Left COURSE Display and RotaryUsed to select the desired VOR radial for the captain's EHSI."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Vertical Speed Display and RotaryWhen VS (Vertical Speed) Mode is engaged, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to this value.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to the value indicated by the Vertical Speed Display.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["Left COURSE Display and RotaryUsed to select the desired VOR radial for the captain's EHSI.", 'Heading Display and RotaryThis display is used in conjunction with the HEADING Rotary.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['C/O Toggle Toggles the IAS / MACH display units between Knots and Mach-numberIAS / MACH Displayand RotaryWhen used in conjunction with the Speed Button, and Auto-Throttle, the autopilot will govern the speed according to this value.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['A/P ENGAGEThe CMD buttons are used to engage the autopilot, noting there are two separate and identical systems - A, and B. Note that, after engaging the autopilot, the desired mode must still be selected subsequently.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Autopilot Disengage Click this button to disengage the autopilot and return full manual control to the flight crew.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['The CWS buttons are used to engage Control Wheel Steering mode, whereby the autopilot will allow the pilot to make inputs using the control wheel, after which it will hold the resulting attitude.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['When Vertical Speed mode is engaged, the autopilot will ascend, or descend at the desired rate, until reaching the altitude displayed here, at which point it will level-off.', 'The CWS buttons are used to engage Control Wheel Steering mode, whereby the autopilot will allow the pilot to make inputs using the control wheel, after which it will hold the resulting attitude.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['The autopilot will steer the aircraft laterally to intercept and track the VOR radial, or ILS localizer that is selected via the active Nav radio.']]]

Note that, after engaging the autopilot, the desired mode must still be selected subsequently.', 'The CWS buttons are used to engage Control Wheel Steering mode, whereby the autopilot will allow the pilot to make inputs using the control wheel, after which it will hold the resulting attitude.', 'Autopilot Disengage Click this button to disengage the autopilot and return full manual control to the flight crew.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to the value indicated by the Vertical Speed Display.', 'The autopilot will level-off and hold the current altitude.', 'The autopilot will steer the aircraft laterally to intercept and track the VOR radial, or ILS localizer that is selected via the active Nav radio.', 'The autopilot will steer according to the Heading Display / EHSI heading bug.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will maintain the current airspeed while ascending, or descending to the selected altitude.', 'Used in conjunction with the auto-throttle, the autopilot will maintain airspeed according to the IAS / MACH Display.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Autopilot Disengage Click this button to disengage the autopilot and return full manual control to the flight crew.', 'this button to engage Vertical Speed Mode.', 'ALT Hold Button Click this button to engage Altitude Hold Mode.', 'VOR / LOC ButtonClick this button to engage VOR or Localizer Mode.', 'HDG Select Button Click this button to engage Heading Mode.', 'LVL CHG ButtonClick this button to engage Vertical Speed Mode.', 'Speed Button Click this button to engage Speed Mode.', "In the real aircraft, this button causes the auto-throttles to advance to a pre-defined limit N1 (turbine) limit expressed using the FMC.Pilot'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Use this switch to toggle the Auto Throttle on, or off.', "First-officer'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan.", "In the real aircraft, this button causes the auto-throttles to advance to a pre-defined limit N1 (turbine) limit expressed using the FMC.Pilot'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan."]]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['C/O Toggle Toggles the IAS / MACH display units between Knots and Mach-numberIAS / MACH Displayand RotaryWhen used in conjunction with the Speed Button, and Auto-Throttle, the autopilot will govern the speed according to this value.', 'Vertical Speed Display and RotaryWhen VS (Vertical Speed) Mode is engaged, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to this value.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ["In the real aircraft, this button causes the auto-throttles to advance to a pre-defined limit N1 (turbine) limit expressed using the FMC.Pilot'sFlight Director SwitchUse this switch to toggle the 'Flight Director' display on, or off for the first-officer's EADI.The flight director computes and displays the proper pitch and bank anglesrequired for the aircraft to follow the desired flight plan."]]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Use the Rotary Control outer ring to adjust the bank angle / rate of turn.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['A/P ENGAGEThe CMD buttons are used to engage the autopilot, noting there are two separate and identical systems - A, and B. Note that, after engaging the autopilot, the desired mode must still be selected subsequently.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['VNAV Button VNAV (Vertical Navigation).']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Altitude Display and RotaryUsed in conjunction with the Altitude Hold Button and Vertical Speed Button.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Vertical Speed Display and RotaryWhen VS (Vertical Speed) Mode is engaged, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to this value.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['When Vertical Speed mode is engaged, the autopilot will ascend, or descend at the desired rate, until reaching the altitude displayed here, at which point it will level-off.', 'this button to engage Vertical Speed Mode.', 'LVL CHG ButtonClick this button to engage Vertical Speed Mode.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['VNAV Button VNAV (Vertical Navigation).']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['VOR / LOC ButtonClick this button to engage VOR or Localizer Mode.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['VOR / LOC ButtonClick this button to engage VOR or Localizer Mode.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['Vertical Speed Display and RotaryWhen VS (Vertical Speed) Mode is engaged, the autopilot will govern the rate of ascent, or descent, according to this value.']]]

[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['When Vertical Speed mode is engaged, the autopilot will ascend, or descend at the desired rate, until reaching the altitude displayed here, at which point it will level-off.']]]
[['737_Pilot_Operating_Manual', ['The autopilot / autothrottle will follow the vertical components of your flight plan.', 'The autopilot will follow the lateral components of your flight plan.']]]
